display_long_description:
Pumpkin Panic VR is a fast-paced, horror-themed VR survival game designed for Halloween thrills and endless replayability. Step into the haunted pumpkin patch, where glowing jack-o’-lanterns light your path — and monsters lurk in the shadows.

🕹️ Core Gameplay:

⭐Run & Survive – Dodge obstacles and stay alive as the monster chases you.

⭐Collect Pumpkins & Candy – Gather glowing pumpkins and hidden candies scattered across the graveyard to boost your score.

⭐Haunted Arena – Creepy fog, twisted trees, gravestones, and eerie jack-o’-lanterns set the stage.

⭐Scare FX – Jump scares, glowing eyes, and spooky sounds keep you on edge.

⚡Replay Again & Again – Short, addictive survival sessions make this the perfect party or seasonal game.

🎃 Halloween Vibes:

⭐Glowing pumpkins to collect and spooky jack-o’-lantern lights.

⭐Foggy haunted graveyards and cursed gardens.

⭐Sinister soundscapes with wind, thunder, and whispers for full immersion.

👻 Can you survive the night, collect the pumpkins, and escape the Pumpkin Monster — or will you be haunted forever?
